title: Abram Rescues Lot
summary: Genesis 14 tells of a war between kings during which Lot is captured. Abram defeats the enemies and rescues Lot. He meets Melchizedek, a priest of God Most High, and gives him a tenth of everything.

faq.question: Who is Melchizedek?
faq.answer: A mysterious priest-king of Salem who blesses Abram and represents God Most High.

faq.question: How did Abram respond to the king of Sodomâ€™s offer?
faq.answer: Abram refused any reward, wanting no man to say he made Abram rich.
